{"id":1066222660,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1696363397,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1066222660/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Value of an Ordered Triplet II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumTripletValue(vector<int>& nums) {\n        long long ans=0;\n        if(nums.size()==3){\n            ans=max(ans,1ll*(nums[0]-nums[1])*nums[2]);\n        }\n        vector<int>v(nums.size(),0);\n        long long  a=INT_MIN;\n        for(int i=nums.size()-1;i>=0;i--){\n            v[i]=a;\n            if(nums[i]>a)a=nums[i];\n        }\n        v[nums.size()-1]=0;\n        int x=nums[0];\n        a=0;\n        for(int i=1;i<nums.size()-1;i++){\n            if(x<nums[i])x=nums[i];\n            else {\n                a=1ll*(x-nums[i])*v[i+1];\n                ans=max(a,ans);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-value-of-an-ordered-triplet-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
